ACTIONS.DELETE_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure that you want to delete?

HOME.TITLE: Landingpage
HOME.TEXT:
Welcome to the Hetzner Cloud Mobile App

This is an unofficial app for the Hetzner Cloud. Using this app you can use many features available in the Hetzner cloud interface directly on your smartphone. You'll also get an overview of all your servers.

ABOUT.TITLE: About this App
ABOUT.TEXT: The developer of this App is Lukas Kämmerling. This App is in no way connected to the company "Hetzner Online GmbH", so unofficial. It only uses a webservice offered by the mentioned company. Only the configured projects are stored on this device. Deleting a configured project will only delete the local data. The API tokens are only used to communicate with the Hetzner Cloud API and not stored on any remote servers.

DELETE_ALL.TITLE: Delete all data
DELETE_ALL.TEXT: Are you sure you want to delete all data? If you want to use this app in future, you have to set up all your projects again.
DELETE_ALL.BUTTON: Yes, I want to delete all local app data.

AUTH.TITLE: Authentication
AUTH.NOT_AVAILABLE: Unfortunately there was no secure authentication found on your device.

SETTINGS.TITLE: Hetzner Status - Settings
SETTINGS.TEXT: This app is able to send push notifications from Hetzner Status. You can enable notification categories individually.

SERVERS.TITLE: My servers
SERVERS.NO_SERVERS: Oh! Looks like you don't have any servers.

ERRORS.REQUIRED_NAME: Please enter a name longer than 3 characters.
ERRORS.NETWORK_ERROR: There was an error executing your task. Please try again.

ERRORS.REQUIRED_NAME: Please enter a name longer than 3 characters.

DESCRIPTION.POWER:
'Shutdown' sends a ACPI signal to the server. In our default setup your server will shut down gracefully.

„Power off“ powers your server off directly. This can cause data loss.

Please note, that server which are powered off are still billed. In our FAQ you can find more information about this.
DESCRIPTION.POWER_RESET: 'Power Reset' resets your server ungraceful. This can cause data loss.

DESCRIPTION.RESCUE_MODE: You can switch to the rescue system by rebooting your server via network after activation. The rescue system will stay activated for 60 minutes. Rebooting your server while booted in rescue mode will switch back to your normal operating system.
DESCRIPTION.RESET_ROOT_PASSWORD: 'Power Reset' resets your server ungraceful. This can cause data loss..

DESCRIPTION.BACKUPS:
Backups are automatic copies of your hard disk. Each server contains 7 slots for backups. If all slots are used, the oldest backup will be deleted. We suggest to shutdown the server when creating a manual backup, so that the data remains consistent.

By activating backups an additional monthly fee of 20% of the server fee will be billed.
DESCRIPTION.SNAPSHOTS:
Snapshots are direct copies of the hard disk of your server.
You can create new server using this snapshot and you're able to move these snapshots to other projects.
We suggest to shutdown the server before creating a snapshot, so that the data is completely consistent.
Snapshots are currently billed 0.0119 €/GB/month (including german VAT of 19%).
DESCRIPTION.REBUILD:
By rebuilding your server, the hard disk will be completely deleted and replaced with the selected image.
All data will be destroyed!

ACTIONS.CREATE_BACKUP: Order backups for the mentioned monthly fee!
ACTIONS.CREATE_SNAPSHOT: Create snapshot for the mentioned monthly fee!

UPGRADE.TITLE: Server Upgrade
UPGRADE.DESCRIPTION:
You need more performance? Upgrade your server. By upgrading, your disk and filesystem will automatically be resized.

Currently it is not possible to downgrade your server to a smaller disk.

Please shut down your server to perform an upgrade.

Upgrading typically takes only some minutes to complete.

ERRORS.REQUIRED_SHUTDOWN: Please shut down the server before upgrading.
ERRORS.NETWORK_ERROR: Error while processing the request. Please try again.
